attributes.action: Stop Polish workers from claiming child benefit for dependants still living in Poland at the expense of the British taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I currently work in a factory which employs 5 Polish workers and each one of them is claiming child benefit for a minimum of two children, none of which even reside in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
